issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I have seen the notice that Titanium is being discontinued and am doing my best to move my current Titanium Studio project over to Appcelerator Studio but:

1) Cannot login to JIRA from Appcelerator Studio using my Titanlum credentials.

2) Cannot work out how to claim my free indie seat.

My Titanium Studio username is bill.noble@vardas.com

h3. Actual Result
Bad Credentiials

h3. Expected Result
Successful login
fields.summary: How to claim free indie seat on Appcelerator

comments.body:
Hello, I tried to signed up your account in [here|http://www.appcelerator.com/]. Looks like you already did that. Can you log in to Appcelerator dashboard web portal?. If so, from there you need to select Manage Billing from the drop down menu of your account. From there you can choose indie package. Follow these steps. Hope this helps. Reply after trying.

Thanks.

Why does platform.appcelerator.com keep asking me for an authorisation ID when I have previously successfully given it one?

I have thought managed to setup my free indie account. Thanks.
Hello, Bill. Did you solve the problem. Can i close the issue. reply, Thanks.
yes thanks all working fine now
